description: Both Hamas and staff at the facility, Gaza's largest hospital, deny the allegations
maintext: More than 11,200 Palestinians - two-thirds of them women and children - have been killed since the war began, according to the Health Ministry in Hamas-run Gaza, which does not differentiate between civilian and militant deaths. About 2,700 people have been reported missing.
title: Hamas weapons and command HQ found in Al-Shifa hospital, Israel claims
